about_the_game:
Bearships is a chill multiplayer chatroom-style game where bears set sail to fish, relax, and share stories. You can fish, decorate, and tend to plants around your ship. Don't forget to keep an eye out for the floating islands drifting by!

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FISH

Reel in over a 100 skyfish species that'll keep your line busy and your belly full.

BEAUTIFUL BEAR BLING

Deck out your bear with tons of different cosmetics and props that will show your lame friends just how much cooler you are.

WE HOPE YOU ENJOY IT :)

Our goal is to create a cozy haven where you can kick back, meet new friends, and leave your worries behind after a long day.

name: Bearships

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: For 1080p: 4+ GB of video memory: GeForce GTX 1080 or similar.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: For 1080p: 4+ GB of video memory: GeForce GTX 2080 or similar.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: We use DLSS which isn't required, but makes a huge difference if you are using a GeForce GTX 2060 or higher.

short_description: Sit back, relax, and cast a line into the clouded sky of Bearships! A chill multiplayer goofy-bear-based game.
